entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:32 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 07:32 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
